author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a letter addressed to trustees of the Sameeksha Trust, longstanding readers and contributors to the journal, Economic and Political Weekly , welcomed the appointment of senior journalist Paranjoy Guha Thakurta as the Editor-designate, set to take charge on April 1 this year.

Even as they complimented the Board for “making [an] excellent choice” to helm the journal and keep its “core secular, democratic, and progressive values,” the signatories to the letter renewed their appeal to the Trust to address the “governance issues” which they had raised in an earlier letter, dated January 15, 2016.

The previous letter was sent to the Trust by the “EPW community” following the early resignation of incumbent Editor, Dr. Rammanohar Reddy from his post. Dr. Reddy had raised issues related to autonomy for the editor vis-à-vis the Board, and which had been endorsed in the previous letter by the signatories.
title: New EPW Editor hailed as ‘excellent choice’
